description: measurement of the original firing temperature of the ceramic material.
name: Firing temperature(min)

description: measurement of the melting point of a ceramic material.
name: Melting point

description: Type and quality of kiln air during firing process, e.g. oxidation, reduction.
name: Firing atmosphere

description: Estimate of the fraction size in the clay of a ceramic. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Coarseness

description: Whether the clay in a ceramic object is sorted or unsorted.
name: Clay: Sorting

description: Estimate of the amount of silt fraction material in a clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Silt

description: Estimate of the amount of sand fraction material in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Sand

description: Estimate of the amount of Calcium carbonate in the clay of a cerami object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Calcarbon

description: Estimate of the amount of ironoxide in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Ironoxide

description: Estimate of the amount of limonite in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Limonite

description: Estimate of the amount of mica in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Mica

description: Estimate of the amount of fossils in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Fossil

description: Estimate of the amount of spongie in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Spongie

description: Estimate of the amount of diatomes in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Diatome

description: Estimate of the amount of organic material in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Organic

description: Estimate of the amount of ore in the clay of a ceramic object. Measured on a scale of 0 - 5.
name: Clay: Ore

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of crushed granite/gneiss or not.
name: Tempering: Granite

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of an unspecified crushed rock or not.
name: Tempering: Rock

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of sand or not.
name: Tempering: Sand

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of crushed ceramics or not.
name: Tempering: Chamotte

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of crushed asbestos or not.
name: Tempering: Asbestos

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of calcium carbonate rich materials or not.
name: Tempering: Calcarbon

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of bones or not.
name: Tempering: Bone

description: Whether the main temper of a ceramic object consists of organic material or not.
name: Tempering: Organic

description: Whether the clay of a ceramic object is naturally" tempered, i. e. didn't need any added tempering. "
name: Tempering: Natural

description: Whether there are other material in the ceramic object which isn't part of the main tempering. In some cases it specifies what the organic material is.
name: Tempering: Accessory

description: The maximum grain size occuring in the ceramic tempering.
name: Tempering: Max Grain Size

description: The amount of tempering in the ceramic material, measured in percent.
name: % - Tempering
